page.title: 10BATTLEDYKES : FARMER'S YEAR
page.content: THE FARMER OF BATTLEDYKES FARM RISES AT 7.00 A.M,GETS DRESSED,HAS HIS BREAKFAST AND IS OUT BY 7.30 A.M. DURING THE{WINTER,}WHEN THE CATTLE ARE INSIDE,HE FEEDS THEM TURNIPS AND HAY.AFTER THIS HE ATTENDS TO MAINTENANCE SUCH AS REPAIRING FENCES, GATES AND MACHINERY.{ { SPRING }IS A VERY BUSY TIME FOR THE FARMER WITH PLOUGHING,SOWING AND TENDING YOUNG LAMBS. DURING THE{SUMMER}THE FARMER IS LESS BUSY WITH HIS CATTLE AS THEY ARE OUT TO GRAZE.HOWEVER AT THIS TIME HE MUST CUT HIS HAY AND SILAGE FOR WINTER FODDER. LATE{SUMMER}EARLY{AUTUMN}IS WHEN HE BUYS AND SELLS HIS LIVESTOCK,WHICH HE DOES AT THE MARKET IN{EDZELL,}AND HARVESTS HIS SPRING CEREALS.
